sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; const Navbar = () => { const ChangeTheme = () => { const html = document.documentElement; if (html.classList.contains("dark")) { html.classList.remove("dark"); localStorage.setItem("theme", "light"); } else { html.classList.add("dark"); localStorage.setItem("theme", "dark"); } }; useEffect(() => { const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem("theme"); if (savedTheme === "dark") { document.documentElement.classList.add("dark"); } }, []); return (
Flowbite
{/* ðŸŒ™ Theme Toggle Button */} {/* â˜° Hamburger Menu Button */}
  • Home

  • Contact
); }; export default Navbar;
